dt: {bc}a heavy often tufted fabric used as a floor covering
{bc}a floor covering made of this fabric
{bc}a surface or layer resembling or suggesting a carpet
{bc}before an authority for censure or reproof

dt.t: got called {it}on the carpet{/it} by his boss

et: Middle English, from Middle French {it}carpite{/it}, from Old Italian {it}carpita{/it}, from {it}carpire{/it} to pluck, modification of Latin {it}carpere{/it} to pluck {ma}{mat|harvest|}{/ma}
shortdef: a heavy often tufted fabric used as a floor covering; also : a floor covering made of this fabric
a surface or layer resembling or suggesting a carpet

dt: {bc}a carpet made of colored worsted yarns first fixed in a foundation web of strong linen thread and then drawn up in loops to form the pattern

shortdef: a carpet made of colored worsted yarns first fixed in a foundation web of strong linen thread and then drawn up in loops to form the pattern

dt: {bc}a carpet in which the designs are printed in colors on the threads before the fabric is woven

shortdef: a carpet in which the designs are printed in colors on the threads before the fabric is woven
